title: Fort Health - a New Model to Tackle the Youth Mental Health Crisis in Partnership with Pediatricians
body: Built at Redesign Health, Fort Health aims to bridge the gap between behavioral health and primary care. Approximately 1 in 5 children in the United States has a mental health condition, but only about half of those who need mental health care are ...

title: Fort Health
